website_summaries.verdict: This is an economical choice for in-ground pool owners who need additional steps for elderly or physically challenged guests.
pros: Stainless steel steps are very sturdy
cons: Some rusting reported after two weeks, especially in salt water pools
Some parts are plastic, not metal

customer_reviews.title: Great ladder. No bracket covers necessary.
customer_reviews.text: Study and fairly easy to install. We had in-ground mounts, which were simple. However, the chrome bracket covers that Amazon recommended to "buy with" this ladder, were not needed. This ladder includes a set of chrome-plated bracket covers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good ladder, NOT for salt pools
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid ladder and fit very nicely in the pool. However, less than 2 months after installation of saltwater generator, the 'stainless' steel is showing rust stains at the water level. Looks like I'll need to buy a different one to handle the salt pool.
customer_reviews.author: DukeRocks

customer_reviews.title: Stands out as something nicer than the norm
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t come with instructions for the latter but I figured it out. It’s easy but the only thing is you’re guessing at which side the washes are supposed to go on the steps....... inside of the polls btw bolts are rusting within a week of being in the water.... $589 seems like a lot to pay for rust in a week!!! smh!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Barr

customer_reviews.title: The ladder is great. The bolts are horrible
customer_reviews.text: The ladder is great. The bolts are horrible. The bolts have a curved head to fit around pipe, but they don't stay in the right position and turn when tightening them. Don't keep trying to get them on correctly or they will start to strip and you will never get them tight or off. I had to replace one bolt and almost a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: In ground pool ladder - not
customer_reviews.text: the rungs of the ladder are way too short! Steps are above the water level. Didn't have instructions (although not hard to figure out) but top step is crooked. Need to bring legs up to chest to even step on lowest rung. Became a decoration rather than a way out of the pool. Hate it and not inexpensive. What a waste of $$$$!
customer_reviews.author: Gwen H.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Sturdy. But started to rust where the screws insert into the steps within the second week of being in the pool. We have a salt pool.
customer_reviews.author: Garrettpac

customer_reviews.title: Solid stairs, can't be busted be the heavy weight kids.
customer_reviews.text: If your tired of the busted plastic stairs, this is for you. Mine kept getting cracked by the big boy kids trying to dive off them. Puck is off the plastic ones, that got busted every year.1
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B.

customer_reviews.title: b.s.
customer_reviews.text: i ordered the exact same pool ladder that i received less then two weeks ago. i asked for the same pool ladder, that is, white coated, stainless steel. they said could not supply. i cancelled my order that same day which was one day after i ordered it and they said 'too late' it has already been shipped. this is b.s. and amazon should drop this company or you will drop me as a customer.
customer_reviews.author: terry r. zuckerman

customer_reviews.title: Steps rust within months
customer_reviews.text: Just bought the ladder 2 1/2 months ago. All three steps are already rusting.
customer_reviews.author: J Smith

customer_reviews.title: Rust
customer_reviews.text: I want to like it, it is sturdy and looks fine. All installation is custom, beware. The problem is that its rusts badly and quickly. Rust stains the plastic treads. Hard to believe it will last.
customer_reviews.author: thomas mahler

customer_reviews.title: Rust
customer_reviews.text: The features say the ladder does not rust, well it does, right at the water line. We have a standard chlorine pool, and we go light on the chemicals. The ladder looked great for the first two months, but now it is looking shoddy.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Jirovec

customer_reviews.title: Great ladder
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was quick. Ladder assembly is easy enough. Fits perfectly in the original anchors.
customer_reviews.author: Erin K. Capelotti

customer_reviews.title: ... to get in and out of our pool works great!!
customer_reviews.text: We needed this for our older parents to get in and out of our pool works great!!! Easy to install looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M Downing

customer_reviews.title: Nothing economy about these sturdy well built steps.
customer_reviews.text: First set lasted 14 years.....certain this will last just as long.
customer_reviews.author: Gflawnman

customer_reviews.title: Dive In
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for our Design Week party. The pool was a great photo opportunity for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jonas DiCaprio

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice ladder just make sure you check on the bolts for the steps they will come loose..
customer_reviews.author: David Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t sure what to expect for the price but was pleasantly surprised. It was lighter weight than the one we got from the pool company but it’s sturdy and good quality. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: These will rust and discolor your pool!
customer_reviews.text: Steps are not stainless and rusted in a little over a month causing my liner and fiberglass stairs to turn brown! Huge waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Ginny T.

customer_reviews.title: Nice ladder
customer_reviews.text: Nice ladder for the price. Fits perfectly. Will see how it holds up to salt water. INCLUDED ESCUTCHEONS
customer_reviews.author: Phil Hess

customer_reviews.title: Was easy to install and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to install and looks great. I have no complaints about this product at all. Would highly recommend to anyone needing a swim ladder for their pool and does not want to pay a lot for a product that works well.
customer_reviews.author: Browntown

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This fit easily and exactly as our old one did in our 25 year old pool
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Has been placed in pool for a month and has ...
customer_reviews.text: Has been placed in pool for a month and has rust stains around top step. Very cheap product will not ever buy Inter-Fab products again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly. All parts in box
customer_reviews.text: Replaced 14 year old ladder with this one. Easy assembly. All parts in box. Amazon packed it well.
customer_reviews.author: EDG

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Doesn’t come with escutcheons. Not a big problem.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but not tacky
customer_reviews.text: I especially like the steps. Worth the extra $30 or so over the really basic ladder. Recommend for residential use.
customer_reviews.author: Party of Six

customer_reviews.title: Inter-Fab 3-step ladder
customer_reviews.text: As in the reviews before what do you do about anchoring it to the cement ? Now we can't install it until we anchor it, Why don't they send the anchoring with the steps. On the picture it shows the anchors on the top of the steps.
customer_reviews.author: Clova McKirch

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was close enough to the 9 year old original.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Starting to rust
customer_reviews.text: We were fortunate that our pool service folks offered to install our new ladder and anchors. All seemed OK until I noticed rust developing around the steps and on the handle rails themselves. This should not be happening. Also I found the steps to high for someone of my stature to use easily. Probably should have gotten a 4 or 5 step ladder. That's on me. Rust isn't.
customer_reviews.author: JTown

customer_reviews.title: Good quality pool steps
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these steps because I needed them quickly. These weren't the cheapest but we're the cheapest that would be delivered in two days. Assembly was moderate level since there is not a lot of room for tools to fit while tightening. Comes with stainless steel frames, three steps, two white Rubber feet and the bolts, nuts and washers to put it together. Escutcheons have to be bought separately.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Clark

product_meta.title: Inter-Fab L3E049S 3 Economy Sure-Step Swimming Pool Ladder, Stainless Steel Treads
product_meta.description: Color:Stainless Steel Treads| Style:EconomyInter-Fab L3E049S 3-Step Economy Ladder with Sure-Step Tread
feature_bullets: 3 step stainless steel ladder with Sure-Step stainless steel tread
20-Inch center- from center of anchor to other anchor

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars51 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
